# Version 1.4.x

[![DPG Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Verified-DPG-3333AB?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://digitalpublicgoods.net/r/dpg-slug)&#x20;

GeoPrism Registry is certified as a Digital Public Good (DPG) of the DPG Alliance.
